DataElement.preferredName: Anatomic Site Symptomatic And Uncontrolled Metastasis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to symptomatic and uncontrolled metastasis of named locations within the body.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Anatomic Site Symptomatic And Uncontrolled Metastasis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Named locations of or within the body._Having to do with symptoms, which are signs of a condition or disease._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Not controlled, regulated, or constrained._The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Named locations of, or within, the body.

Concepts.definition: Named locations of or within the body.

Concepts.definition: Exhibiting the symptoms of a particular disease.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.

The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have symptomatic
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have symptomatic and uncontrolled metastasis in the central nervous system or leptomeningeal or lymphangitic carcinomatosis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known symptomatic brain metastases requiring steroids?
